name: RRR
title: RRR (Rise Roar Revolt)
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920s
reviews: A weak writing sparkled by Rajamouli's extraordinary mass elements and Ram Charan & Jr. NTR's larger-than-life characters
A Magnificent Movie By SS Rajamouli

name: Thor
title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor enlists the help of Valkyrie, Korg and ex-girlfriend Jane Foster to fight Gorr the God Butcher, who intends to make the gods extinct.
